step1.title: Eligibility Confirmation
step1.welcome: Welcome, and thank you for your interest in becoming a Community Evaluator for the Zero Bureaucracy Program. We appreciate your willingness to contribute to improving government services.
step1.employmentQuestion: Before we begin, please confirm whether you are currently employed by any federal entity in the UAE.
step1.item1: About you (which will include job description and details)
step1.saveNote: You can save your progress at any time. Your information is secure and used only to evaluate your nomination.

step2.title: About You
step2.dragDropText: Drag and drop your CV here, or click to select

step3.title: Purpose of Participation
step3.whyParticipate: Why would you like to be a community evaluator in the Zero Bureaucracy Program?
step3.relevantExperience: Relevant experience or perspective you bring

step4.title: Evaluation Experience
step4.haveParticipated: Have you ever participated in jury panels, assessment committees, or evaluation activities?

step5.title: Agreement and consent
step5.privacyText1: Your privacy is important to us. This privacy statement explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you participate as a community evaluator in the Zero Bureaucracy Program.
step5.privacyText2: By participating, you consent to the collection and processing of your personal data as described in this statement. Your information will be used solely for evaluation purposes and will be handled in accordance with UAE data protection regulations.
step5.confirmAgreement: I confirm that I meet the eligibility criteria and agree to participate as a community evaluator if selected.

step6.title: Review & Submit
step6.reviewInstruction: Review your responses below. You can edit any section before submitting.
step6.whyParticipate: Why would you like to be a community evaluator in the Zero Bureaucracy Program?
step6.relevantExperienceQuestion: Relevant experience or perspective you bring (Select all that apply)
step6.haveParticipatedQuestion: Have you ever participated in jury panels, assessment committees, or evaluation activities?
step6.confirmEligibility: I confirm that I meet the eligibility criteria and agree to participate as a community evaluator if selected.

thanks.heading: Thank you!
thanks.successMessage: Your nomination has been submitted successfully.
thanks.ineligibleMessage: Sorry but you are not eligible to participate in the survey as you are currently employed by a federal entity

common.invalidFile: Only PDF and DOCX files are allowed
common.fileSizeError: File size exceeds 10MB limit. Your file is
